Los sueños de Betsi son mejorar e implementar su negocio y que sus hijos cumplan con sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Betsi is a member of the Banco Comunal Cori Soncco (Cori Soncco Communal Bank), which means Corazón de Oro (Heart of Gold) in the Quechua language. Betsi is married, 27 years old and has 3 children. Betsi along with her husband have a printing press and bookstore. There are 2 locations that are situated in the center of the city of Ayacucho, employing 3 workers.

Betsi needs a loan of 2000 soles that she will invest in the purchase of inks. Betsi’s dreams are to improve and implement her business and that her children achieve their goals.

Translated from Spanish by Breanne Kochert, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of inks.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es:
Florentina es socia del Banco Comunal Corí Soncco que significa Corazón D. Oro en quechua.
Florentina es casada, tiene 53 años y 4 hijos, Florentina junto a su esposo tienen un laboratorio D. análisis clínico, tienen 3 sucursales todos ellos en locales alquilados para lo cual cuenta con 3 trabajadores que se encargan D. la atención.
Florentina necesita un préstamo D. 3000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. reactivos.
Los sueños D. Florentina son equipar su laboratorio y descansar, irse D. paseo largo junto a su esposo.
texts.en:
Florentina is a partner of the Corí Soncoo Communal Bank, which means "Heart of Gold" in Quechua. Florentina, 53, is married with four children. Together with her husband she has a clinical examination lab. They have three offices, all in rented locales with 3 workers to take care of providing services.

Florentina needs a loan of 3,000 soles, which will be invested in buying reagents. Florentina's dreams are to properly equip her lab and to take a much deserved break, going on a long trip with her husband.

Translated from Spanish by Todd Schmid, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of reagents

loans.name: Oneyda De Jesús

texts.es:
En el municipio de El Sauce de la ciudad de León la señora Oneyda E. con mucha alegría se dedica a su actividad económica de venta de ropa y cosméticos vendidos ambulantemente en su municipio donde a diario se esfuerza para salir adelante.

Actualmente la razón por la cual ha acudido a Ceprodel es para solicitar un crédito para la compra de los cosméticos y la ropa ya que actualmente se le han agotado y para ello espera que su crédito sea otorgado y de esta manera salir adelante en su negocio que tanto requiere de su apoyo para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
In the municipality of El Sauce of the city of León, Mrs. Oneyda E. is dedicated, with great joy, to her business of clothing and cosmetics which she sells on foot in her municipality. Every day she strives to get ahead. The reason she has come to Ceprodel is to ask for a loan for the purchase of cosmetics and clothing because now she has run out. She is waiting for her loan to be granted, and through this she will succeed in her business ,which requires your support to improve the living conditions of her family.

Translated from Spanish by Donna Yates, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy clothing and cosmetics for sale

loans.name: Mildre Olivia

texts.es:
LA Sra. Mildre es nacida en la ciudad de Potosí, y actualmente vive en la localidad del torno en la zona de  Santa Rita, en la casa de sus padres los cuales ya fallecieron,  es madre soltera vive con sus hermana. 
La actividad a la que se dedica por mas de un año es la elaboración de pan casero, con este negocio mantiene a su familia.
Además de esto también cuenta con el ingreso de la renta de sus vagoneta para al que ahora esta solicitando el crédito.
Es una persona muy trabajadora mantiene a su hijo sola y hace estudiar a su hermana que ahora se encuentra bajo su responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Mildres was born in Potosí city and today lives in the Santa Rita neighborhood of Torno. She lives in her parent’s home (they are deceased), she is a single mother and lives with her sister. For more than a year she has been making bread and with this business supports her family. In addition she also has income from renting her car for which she is seeking a loan. She works very hard to support her only son and so that her sister, for whom she is now responsible, can study.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a fuel system for her transportation vehicle

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
En el municipio de El Sauce de la bella ciudad de Nicaragua, la señora Maritza M. con gran esfuerzo se dedica a su actividad de elaboración y venta de lácteos tales como queso y cuajada los cuales elabora ella misma para luego comercializarlos en su municipio.

Es de importancia destacar que hoy en día ella ha acudido a Ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra de los lácteos  y para esto espera que Ceprodel le proporcione el crédito y así comprar a lo inmediato los lácteos y continuar en el mejoramiento de su negocio.
texts.en:
In the El Sauce municipality in beautiful Nicaragua, Mrs. Maritza M., with great effort, makes and sells milk products such as cheese and curds which she herself makes and then sells in her municipality. It is important to note that today she has approached Ceprodel for a loan to buy lactose products and so she hopes that Ceprodel grants her a loan so that she can buy them immediately and continue improving her business.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy ingredients

loans.name: Fortunata

texts.es:
Fortunata es socia del Banco Comunal Corí Soncco que significa Corazón de Oro en quechua.
Fortunata es casada, tiene 56 años y 5 hijos, Fortunata viaja a diferentes ferias de la región en donde vende mercería como artículos de limpieza, candados, linternas  y lana, actividad que realiza con la ayuda de su hija.
Fortunata necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de candados, lanas.
Los sueños de Fortunata son brindar una buena educación y alimentación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fortunata is a member of the “Corí Soncco” Communal Bank which means Heart of Gold in Quechua. Fortunate is married, 56 years old, and has 5 children. Fortunata travels to different markets in the region where she sells general merchandise such as cleaning items, padlocks, flashlights and wool. She does this work with the help of her daughter. Fortunata needs a loan for 1000 soles which will be investeed in the purchase of flashlights and wool. Fortunata dreams of providing a good education and food to her children.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy flashlights and wool

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
Doris es socia del Banco Comunal Corí Soncco que significa Corazón de Oro en quechua.
Doris es casada, tiene 35 años y 2 hijos, Doris se dedica a la compra y venta de tara, cochinilla, sus productos los adquiere en algunos pueblos y también los productores le traen a su casa, luego de acopiar los envía a la ciudad de Lima.
Doris necesita un préstamo de 1600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de tara, cochinilla.
Doris sueña con brindar una buena educación a sus hijos para que tengan un buen futuro y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Doris is a member of the “Corí Soncco” Communal Bank which means Heart of Gold in Quechua. Doris is married, 35 years old, and has 2 children. Doris buys and sells tara tree and pork She acquires her products in various towns and also the producers bring the items to her house, after gathering up her goods she sends them to Lima. Doris needs a loan for 1600 soles which will be invested in the purchase of tara tree and pork. Doris dreams of providing a good education to her children so that they can have a good future and also to improve her business.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy tara tree and pork

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es:
Maximiliana es socia del Banco Comunal Nueva Era.
Maximiliana es casada, tiene 53 años y 5 hijos, Maximiliana tiene un puesto en el mercado Grau en donD. venD. cereales, sus productos los adquiere D. los productores que le traen a su puesto.
Maximiliana necesita un préstamo D. 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. maní, papa seca.
Maximiliana sueña con tener mas capital y educar a sus dos últimos hijos.
texts.en:
Maximiliana is a member of the Banco Comunal Nueva Era (New Era Communal Bank). Maximiliana is married, 53 years old and has 5 children. Maximiliana has a place in the Grau Market where she sells cereals. She acquires her products from the producers that bring them to her at her place in the market.

Maximiliana needs a loan of 1000 soles that she will invest in the purchase of peanuts and dried potatoes. Maximiliana dreams of having more capital for her business and being able to educate her two youngest children.

Translated from Spanish by Breanne Kochert, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of peanuts and dried potatoes.

loans.name: Adela Natividad

texts.es:
Adela es socia del Banco Comunal Nueva Era.
Adela es casada, tiene 43 años y 4 hijos, Adela junto a su esposo se dedican a la fabricación de ladrillos artesanales y también compran ladrillos crudos que luego los queman, en sus terrenos de la comunidad de Compañía, los ladrillos los vende en la misma comunidad y también lo reparte en la ciudad de Huanta.
Adela necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de ladrillo crudo.
Adela sueña con comprar un terreno en la ciudad de ayacucho para construir su casa y comprar un carro mas.
texts.en:
Adela is an associate of the Banco Comunal Nueva Era [New Era Communal Bank]. Adela is married, 43 years old, and has four children. Adela and her husband apply themselves to the fabrication of artisan bricks. They also buy raw bricks that they later fire themselves on their land in the community of Compañía. They sell the bricks within the same community and also distribute them in the city of Huanta.

Adela needs a loan of 1000 Peruvian soles that she would be invested in the purchase of raw bricks. Adela’s dream is to by a land in the city of Ayacucho in order to build her house and buy another car.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: In order to buy raw bricks. / Para la compra de ladrillo crudo.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma es socia del Banco Comunal Nueva Era.
Norma es conviviente, tiene 29 años y 3 hijos, Norma tiene una tienda en un local alquilado en donde vende abarrotes y también es un pequeño bar, actividad que realiza todos los días.
Norma necesita un préstamo de 1500 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de cerveza, arroz y azúcar.
Los sueños de Norma son tener casa propia y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Norma is an associate of the New Era Communal Bank. Norma lives in a shared home. She is 29 years old and has 3 children. Norma has a store in a rented location where she sells groceries and also tends a small bar; an activity that she carries out every day. Norm needs a loan of 1500 soles, money that will be invested in the purchase of beer, rice and sugar. Norma's dreams are to have her own home and that her children become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy beer, rice and sugar for her grocery store.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma del Carmen Martínez C. tiene 45 años de edad, su estado civil es soltera. Doña Carmen tiene 2 hijos y todos estudian. La actividad económica de Doña Norma es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 14 años que se dedica a este negocio, por lo que inicio con clientes que le pedían los productos en manera de encargo. Los propósitos de Doña Norma son de mantener este negocio ya que es su única fuente de ingresos. El financiamiento es destinado para capital de trabajo ya que con esto compraría camisetas, bolsos, calzado y ropa para damas y caballeros. Los deseos de Doña Norma son de tener suficiente capital para trabajar de manera más segura. La cantidad que solicita es de C$12.000 córdobas.
texts.en:
Norma del Carmen Martínez C. is 45 years old. Her marital status is single. Doña Carmen has 2 children and they are all students. Norma's economic activity is the sale of general merchandise. For more than 14 years she has been dedicated to this business, which she started with clients that placed orders for the products . Doña Carmen's goal is to maintain this business since it is her only source of income. The loan will be used for working capital, since with this she will buy undershirts, handbags, footwear and clothes for ladies and gentlemen. Her dream is to have sufficient capital to work in a more secure manner. The amount that she requests is 12,000 Cordobas.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: working capital to buy clothing for sale in her general store

loans.name: Luisa Del Carmen

texts.es: La Señora Luisa del Carmen G. M. tiene la edad de 58 años, su estado civil es casada. Doña Luisa se dedica a la actividad económica de una pulpería. Hace más de doce años que se dedica este negocio, pero este negocio lo ha iniciado con capital propio para la ayuda de la manutención de su familia. Los propósitos de Doña Luisa son de son de obtener ingresos con su negocio ya que este es el único medio de supervivencia. El financiamiento es destinado par capital de trabajo ya que con esto podrá comprar productos como: golosinas, pan, granos básicos y otros. Sus sueños son de convertir su pequeño negocio en una distribuidora que ofrezca lo necesario. La cantidad que solicita es de C$ 9.500 córdobas.
texts.en:
La Señora Luisa del Carmen G. M. is 58 years old and married. Doña Luisa is dedicated to running a convenience store. For over twelve years she has been dedicated to this business, but this business was started with her own capital to help with the maintenance of her family. The purpose of Doña Luisa is to earn an income with her business since this is her only means of survival. The loan will be used as working capital to buy products such as: cookies, bread, basic grains and more. Her dreams are to convert her small business into that of a distributor that offers necessities. The amount that she requests is 9,500 Cordobas.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: working capital to buy cookies, bread, basic grains and more for her convenience store

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es: Amelia tiene 30 años de edad, vive con su madre, con su pareja y su único hijo, quienes le incentivan a seguir adelante. La casa donde viven es de su madre. Se dedica a vender comidas regionales, como juanes (pollo con arroz, aceitunas y huevo envuelto en una hoja), tacacho (plátano aplastado mezclado con aceite), patarashca (pescado asado envuelto en una hoja) y otras variedades de comidas de la selva. Esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 3 años en forma continua, vende solo por las noches en las afueras de su casa por encontrarse en un buen lugar para el comercio. Le gusta mucho su trabajo porque conoce a muchas personas y se relaciona bastante, además le es muy rentable porque muchas personas degustan de su comida regional y les encanta su buena sazón. Más adelante Amelia quiere tener un restaurante solo de comidas típicas de su región, la selva. Este es su 2do préstamo con MFP,  y le gusta trabajar con su banco comunal porque son personas honestas y de mucha responsabilidad. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá para comprar los productos para la preparación de sus comidas, y una mínima parte para arreglar algunas estructuras de su casa.
texts.en:
Amelia is 30 years old. She lives with her mother, her partner and her only son, who she encourages to continually improve himself. The house where they live belongs to her mother. She is dedicated to the sale of regional foods, like juanes (chicken with rice, olives and egg wrapped in a leaf), tacacho (banana crushed and mixed with oil), patarashca (roasted fish wrapped in a leaf) and other varieties of foods of the area. She has performed this activity continuously for 3 years. She only sells in the evenings outside her house, it being located in a good place for commerce. She likes her work a lot because she has come to know many people and she relates well to them. Besides this, the business is very profitable because many people taste their regional food and its good flavor charms them. In the future Amelia wants to have a restaurant of only typical foods of her region, the forest. This is their second loan with MFP. She likes to work with her communal bank because they are honest people with much responsibility. The money that she requests will be invested to buy the products for the preparation of her foods. A small part wil be used to fix some parts of her house.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make her regional foods

loans.name: Carla

texts.es: Carla tiene 19 años, es soltera, estudiante universitaria y vive solo con su madre. Se dedica al arte de las manualidades, pues hace zapatos adornados con bijouteria, cuenta con el apoyo de su mamá, quien se siente muy orgullosa por su espíritu de trabajo y estudio. En esta actividad tiene ya 2 años, y le gusta porque es el arte que le nace desde muy pequeña, además le es rentable porque cuenta con mucha clientela en la universidad donde asiste. Sin embargo, no solo se dedica a eso, también es propietaria de un motocarro, el mismo que es manejado por un chofer particular desde hace un año y ella es quien administra las ganancias. Posteriormente, Carla quiere tener una tienda de zapatos. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, le gusta trabajar con su banco comunal porque le dieron la oportunidad de salir adelante y es una de las integrantes que exige mucha comunicación y estricta responsabilidad entre todos. Invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de plantillas de zapatos y materiales de bijouteria, para seguir con la elaboración de su bonito calzado.
texts.en:
Carla is 19 years old. She is a single university student and lives only with her mother. She is dedicated to the art of handicrafts: she makes shoes adorned with beadwork. She relies on the support of her mom, who feels very proud of her spirit of work and study. She has already worked at this activity for 2 years, and she likes it because it is the art that was born in her since she was very small. Besides this, it is profitable because she can count on a lot of clients in the university that she attends. Nevertheless, this is not her only activity. She is also the owner of a three-wheeled delivery van, which she has driven as a private chauffeur for one year and she administers the profits herself. Subsequently, Carla wants to have a shoe store. This is her second loan with MFP. She likes to work with her communal bank because they gave her the opportunity to get ahead and they require a lot of communication and strict responsibility among all. She will invest the money that she requests in buying insoles for shoes and beadwork materials, to continue making her pretty footwear.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy soles for shoes and beadwork materials to make beaded shoes for sale

loans.name: Julio Francisco

texts.es: El Señor Julio Francisco D. C. tiene la edad de 36 años, su estado civil es casado. Don Julio tiene 2 hijos y todos estudian. La actividad económica de Don Julio es venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 15 años que se dedica a este negocio, ya que comenzó con la ayuda de su Mama. Los propósitos de Don julio son de satisfacer a sus clientes con la calidad de sus productos. Es por eso que solicita un financiamiento destinado para capital de trabajo con esto podrá comprar calzado, ropa y camisetas. Sus deseos son de proporcionarle mantenimiento a su vivienda para que en un futuro esta no tenga problemas y este acondicionada de la mejor forma. La cantidad que solicita es de C$ 9.900 córdobas.
texts.en:
Mr. Julio Francisco D. C. is thirty-six years old and married. Julio has two children and they are both students. His business is general retail sales. He has been in this business for over 15 years since he started with his mother's help. Julio's main objectives are to satisfy his customers with quality products. This is why he requests a loan for work capital, as this will allow him to purchase shoes, clothes and shirts. He desires to provide his residence with maintenance so that in the future it will not have problems and will be in top condition. The amount he requests is $500 USD.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Thread and materials for weaving

loans.name: Carminia

texts.es: Carminia es soltera, tiene 31 años de edad, en la actualidad vive con sus padres en casa de ellos. Es una mujer muy emprendedora, se dedica a la venta de pollos, los cuales vende a un caserío a tres días de viaje río arriba de la ciudad de Pucallpa. Ahí también, compra y vende madera, con estas actividades lleva 4 años y le va muy bien porque los 200 pollos que lleva a vender salen muy rápido, a un buen precio cada uno (S/.20.00). Le gusta mucho su trabajo porque conoce muchos lugares ribereños y le es rentable. Más adelante, Carminia quiere mandar a construir un galpón para criar sus pollos y dejar de comprar a sus proveedores.  Este es su 2do préstamo con MFP, su banco comunal se llama “Cumbres Mundiales” y le gusta ser integrante porque existe mucha responsabilidad y exigencia entre todos. Carminia invertirá la mitad del monto solicitado en la compra de pollos y el resto en madera.
texts.en:
Carminia is single, thirty-one years old, and currently lives with her parents in their home. She is an enterprising woman who sells chickens to a farm house located in the city of Pucallpa, which is a three day river trip. She also buys and sells wood there. For four years, she has been engaging in these business activities and is doing well because the 200 chickens that she takes with her to sell go very fast at a good price (20 Peruvian Nuevos Soles each). She likes her job very much because she knows many riverside places and it is profitable. Later on, Carminia would like to build a shed in order to raise her chickens and stop buying from her suppliers. This is her second loan with MFP and her bank's name is "Cumbres Mundiales." She likes being a member because it is demanding and entails much responsibility among everyone. Carminia will invest half of the requested loan amount on chickens and the rest on wood.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase her merchandise

loans.name: Gabriel Gertrudis

texts.es: Gabriel Gertrudis V. O. tiene la edad de 55 años, su estado civil es casado. Don Gabriel tiene 4 hijos y todos trabajan. La actividad económica de Don Gabriel es un restaurante. Hace mas de 15 años que se dedica a este negocio el labora con sus hijos y su esposa atiende todos los días de la semana, pero los fines de semana son los días de mayor actividad. Los propósitos de Don Gabriel son de ampliar su negocio para proporcionarles más comodidad a sus clientes. Es por este motivo que don Gabriel decide visitar las oficinas de Fundación León 2000 con el propósito de invertir en negocio destinado para el capital de trabajo para la compra de pollo, verduras, granos básicos, gaseosas y condimentos. Sus deseos son de obtener un local que sea exclusivo para  eventos empresariales. La cantidad que solicita es de C$ 15.000 córdobas.
texts.en:
Gabriel Gertrudis V. O. is fifty-five years old and married. He has four children and they all work. Gabriel's business is owning and managing a restaurant. For over fifteen years he has been in this business and works with this children while his wife attends every day of the week, although weekends are the busiest days. Gabriel's objectives are to expand his business in order to provide more comfort to his customers. This is why he decided to visit the Fundacion Leon 2000 offices with the purpose of investing in this business with work capital to purchase chickens, vegetables, grains, soda pops and condiments. He desires to acquire a locale that is exclusive for business activities. The amount he requests is $750 USD.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

loans.name: Doris

texts.es: Doris es madre de tres hijos, tiene 45 años y tiene a su lado a su esposo quien le apoya en todo, sobre todo en su negocio. Se dedica a vender comida por las noches, los muy conocidos y típicos platillos de la selva llamados “Juanes” (pollo con arroz, huevo, aceitunas y envuelto en hoja de bijao), también pollo asado a la parrilla, entre otras variedades. Este negocio lo tiene en las afueras de su casa desde hace un año, y lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que se relaciona con muchas personas, además que le es rentable porque toda su comida se vende rápido por su buena sazón y encontrarse en un buen lugar.  También es propietaria de dos motocarros, que manejan su esposo y su hijo, quienes se dedican al transporte de pasajeros por las diferentes zonas de donde viven, y es Doris quien administra las ganancias diarias. Más adelante quiere llegar a tener su restaurante. Este es su 2do préstamo con MFP, y le gusta trabajar con su banco comunal porque le brindan confianza y todos son puntuales con sus pagos. El dinero que ahora solicita lo invertirá en ampliar su pequeño kiosco y en el mantenimiento de sus motocarros.
texts.en:
Doris is a 45-year-old mother of three and has her husband by her side whom she supports in everything, especially his business. She sells food at night, particularly the well-known and typical jungle dishes called "Juanes" (chicken and rice, egg and olives wrapped in plantain leaves), in addition to grilled roasted chicken, among other varieties. She has had this business outside of her home for a year. She likes her job very much because she interacts with many people and it is profitable because her food sells very fast due to its good seasoning and the fact that it is in a convenient location. She is also owner of two tricycles which her husband and son drive to different areas around town as they transport passengers. Doris is the one who manages the daily revenue. Later on she would like to have her own restaurant. This is her second loan with MFP and she likes working with her communal bank because it is trustworthy and everyone is punctual with their payments. The money she requests now will be invested toward the expansion of her small kiosk and the maintenace of her tricycles.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expansion of her kiosk and maintenace of her tricycles

loans.name: Daysi Georgina

texts.es: La señora Daysi Georgina V. A. tiene la edad de 35 años, su estado civil es soltera. La actividad económica de Doña Daysi es la venta de ropa y cosméticos. Hace más de 4 años que se dedica a este negocio, Doña Daisy heredo este negocio de su Mama y por lo que decidió hacerse cargo de su negocio para no perder esta fuente de ingresos. Los propósitos de Doña Daysi para su negocio son de son de engrandecer su negocio con el fin de mantener este trabajo. El financiamiento que Doña Daysi solicita es para capital de trabajo como es la compra de ropa, cosméticos y calzado. Sus deseos son de poseer una pulpería para que esta pueda ser una fuente de ingresos para su familia. la cantidad que solicita es de C$ 9.000 córdobas.
texts.en:
Ms. Daysi Georgina V. A. is thirty-five years old and single. Her business is clothing and cosmetics retail sales. She has been in this business for four years since she inherited it from her mother and decided to manage the business so that she would not lose the steady flow of income. Daysi's objective is to expand her business with the goal to keep this job. The financing that Daysi requests is for work capital which will go towards the purchase of clothing, cosmetics, and shoes. She wishes to have a grocery store that provides her family with an inflow of income. The loan amount she requests is $450 USD.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia Cortina, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Work capital

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana tiene 33 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos y su esposo. Aprendió el arte de las manualidades y ahora confecciona carteras de diferentes modelos, las decora con bordados y bijouteria; también vende zapatos, ambos artículos los lleva a vender por diferentes lugares de la zona donde vive, dejándolos al crédito o al contado. Esta labor la está realizando desde hace un año atrás y le va muy bien. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que conoce muchos lugares, se relaciona e conversa con sus clientes, además le es muy rentable porque solo trabaja a pedido, ya que cuenta con clientes selectos. Posteriormente, Juana quiere poner una tienda de ropa. Este es su 2do préstamo con MFP, su banco comunal se llama “Cumbres Mundiales” y le gusta trabajar con su grupo porque son carismáticos y unidos. Juana usará el dinero que solicita en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de sus carteras, y con otra parte invertirá en el negocio de su esposo, que se dedica a la compra y venta de madera.
texts.en:
Juana is 33 years old and lives with her three children and her spouse. She has learned the art of hand crafts and now makes various purses decorated with embroidery and beadwork; she also sells shoes. Both are sold in different places in the area in which she lives, and she drops them off for credit or for cash. She has been doing this work for a year and it is going very well.

What she likes most about her work is the relationship and conversations that she has with her clients and that she gets to know many places. Also it is very profitable because she only works on demand, and with selected customers. Someday, Juana would like to have a clothing store. This is her 2nd loan with Microfinanzas PRISMA, her communal bank is called “Cumbres Mundiales” (World Summit) and she likes working with this group because they are charismatic and united. Juana will use the money that she is asking for to buy materials for decorating her purses, and also to invest in the business of her spouse who works in the buying and selling of wood.

Translated from Spanish by Donna Yates, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy materials to decorate her handmade purses

loans.name: Mayco

texts.es: Mayco tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos que son la luz de su vida y sus ganas de salir adelante. Se dedica a la elaboración y venta de hielo en barra, su principales cliente son los pescadores, quienes compran este tipo de hielo porque se derrite con lentitud. Esta actividad la viene ejerciendo desde hace 8 años y le va muy bien, ya que cuenta con personas capacitadas para la fabricación de este hielo. Lo que le gusta su trabajo es que se relaciona con todo tipo de personas, además le es rentable porque produce 100 barras de hielo cada 15 horas y vende 100 barras al día. Más adelante, Mayco quiere mandar a arreglar su pequeña fábrica de hielo para que tenga una mejor vista. Y por ellos solicita este préstamo, además de incrementar su capital de inversión. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, y lo que le gusta de trabajar con su banco comunal es que son personas muy responsables y cuando alguien necesita apoyo todos colaboran.
texts.en:
Mayco is 32 years old and lives with his wife and two children who are the light of his life and his reason for getting ahead. He produces and sells blocks of ice. His primary customers are the fishermen, who buy this type of ice because it melts slowly.

Mayco has been conducting this business for 8 years and it is very good to him, and now he is considered a qualified person in the production of this type of ice. What he likes about his job is that he gets to connect with all types of people. Additionally it is profitable because he produces 100 blocks of ice every 15 hours and sells 100 blocks a day. Eventually Mayco wants to fix up his small ice factory so that it has a nicer look. For those reasons he asks for this loan, additionally he wants to increase his investment in working capital. This is his second loan with MFP, and what he likes about working with a communal bank is that they are very responsible people and when someone needs support they all collaborate.

Translated from Spanish by Breanne Kochert, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital for his ice factory.

loans.name: Melita

texts.es: Melita tiene 35 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos que la apoyan en todo. Se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, productos de primera necesidad, bebidas, ropa, y algunos adornos en un espacio que acondicionó en su casa. Esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 9 meses y atiende durante todo el día. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es sentirse útil ante los demás y le es muy rentable ya que por donde ella vive es el único negocio con todos estos productos, no hay un día que no deje de vender, y le va muy bien. Más adelante, Melita quiere mejorar su negocio hasta constituir un minimarket, ya que por el momento aun le falta mucho por avanzar, comenta. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, y el dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mayor cantidad de productos para surtir su tienda.
texts.en:
Melita is 35 years old and lives with her husband and their 2 children who help her with everything. She sells groceries, basic commodities, drinks, clothing and a few decorative goods in a space located in her house. She has had this business for the past 9 months and attends to the store the whole day. What she likes about her job is that she feels helpful to everyone. Her business has been very profitable because where she lives, it is the only business with all of these products. There is not a single day where she does not sell anything, and everything is going very well for her. In the future, Melita wants to advance her business by setting up a mini-market, but for right now, she says she is lacking many things that would even help her to move forward. This is her first loan with MFP, and she will invest the money that she is requesting to buy larger quantities of products to stock her store.

Translated from Spanish by Sarah Sattin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy products to sell in her store

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 40 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos que están en edad escolar. Se dedica a la compra y venta de vacunos, cuenta con el apoyo de su hermano, quien es el encargado de comprar los animales en los diferentes fundos que se encuentran por los caseríos o carreteras fuera de la ciudad de Pucallpa. Luego se los manda para que Nancy los venda, que en su mayoría lo hace al camal de la ciudad. Esta actividad la realiza tres días a la semana, y hasta el momento le es rentable, porque siempre vende la cantidad de animales que compra, ya que los lugares donde los lleva ya la conocen y la esperan en fechas programadas. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, y la cantidad que solicita esta vez es para la compra de mayor cantidad de animales, para que pueda incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Nancy is 40 years old, lives with her husband and 5 school-aged children. She buys and sells cattle with the help of her brother, who is in charge of buying the animals from different farms that are located in the rural farm area or highways outside of Pucallpa city. He then sends them to Nancy who sells them, which are primarily sold in the city. This activity she does three time a week, and the business has been profitable because she always sells the quantity of animals that she buys. Now she is known in the areas where she sells them and they await her on the predetermined dates. This is her second loan with MFP, and she seeks a loan to buy a greater quantity of animals so that she can increase her earnings.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy animals to resell

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra tiene 34 años de edad, vive con sus 2 menores hijos y su esposo, quienes la apoyan en todo lo necesario. La casa donde viven es propia, como resultado del esfuerzo de su trabajo. Se dedica a la venta de comida por las noches en las afuera de su casa, además, junto con su esposo tiene una tienda de repuestos, este negocio también lo implementó en su casa. Ambas actividades las realiza desde hace 8 años, por una temporada dejó la venta de comida, pero luego se dio cuenta que se aburría, y comenzó nuevamente con el negocio. Es por ello que lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que se mantiene ocupada, ya que se considera una mujer muy activa, y está contenta porque ambos negocios le son rentables y complementan los ingresos en su hogar. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, el dinero que está solicitando es para incrementar la mercadería de su tienda de repuestos. Sandra comenta que estos artículos son muy costosos, cuando invierte en mercadería, muchas veces le alcanza para una o dos cajas de algún material.
texts.en:
Sandra is 34 year old and lives with her 2 small children and husband, who depend on her for everything. They live in their own house which is a result of her work efforts. At night she sells food outside of her home and, together with her husband, she also has a spare parts store, a business also started in her home. They have had both businesses for 8 years but for a short while she left the food business. She soon realized she was becoming bored and started the business again. It is for this reason she likes her work, it keeps her busy since she considers herself a very active woman. She is happy because both businesses are profitable and complement the household income. This is her second loan with MFP. The money she is requesting is to increase the merchandise of her spare parts store. Sandra states that, when investing in merchandise, these articles are very expensive, often enough for one or two boxes of materials.

Translated from Spanish by Pamela Reynolds, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Sully

texts.es: Sully tiene 33 años, es madre soltera y vive con sus tres hijos. Estudió el arte de las manualidades, trabaja elaborando objetos en cerámicas al frío, flores, bijouteria, textiles, carteras, zapatos, etc. Ha hecho de su casa su taller de trabajo y local de capacitación en este arte a las personas interesadas en aprender. Adicionalmente, trabaja para algunas instituciones como capacitadora en manualidades, ya que es toda una experta, tiene 8 años de experiencia con su negocio y le va muy bien. Su meta más cercana es mandar a construir un local para implementar un taller de manualidades con todo lo necesario. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, el dinero que está solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de las diversas manualidades que vende.
texts.en:
Sully is 33 years old and a single mother who lives with her three children. She studied the art of handicraft making, and makes a living producing objects out of modeling clay, flowers, imitation jewelry, textiles, purses, shoes, etc. Sully has made part of her home into a crafts workshop and a place for training people who are interested in learning her art. In addition, Sully works as a handicraft instructor at several institutions; with 8 years of experience in her business she is already an expert, and things are continuing to go well. Right now her goal is to have separate premises constructed where she can set up a crafts workshop that has everything she needs. This is Sully’s second loan with Kiva partner MFP. Sully will use the money she is requesting to invest in purchasing the materials she needs to produce the various handicrafts she sells.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing materials for her handicrafts

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz tiene 39 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en casa de su suegra. Desde hace 12 años vende golosinas y comida en un centro educativo ubicado cerca de su casa, atiende todas las mañanas con ayuda de su esposo y por las tardes descansa, planeando la venta del día siguiente, de esta manera obtienen los ingresos para el sustento familiar. Para Beatriz y toda su familia este negocio trae muchas satisfacciones, una de ellas es mantener a la familia unida, además de ser un negocio rentable porque siempre las golosinas y comida satisfacen una necesidad básica. Para más adelante desea implementar su negocio con vitrinas  de exposición. Es la segunda vez que Beatriz está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, ella es una de las socias más activas de su banco comunal y disfruta de cada reunión que se da a pesar de que a veces existan inconvenientes, ella busca la conciliación. El dinero que está solicitando es para comprar plataformas de exhibición para los pasteles que implementará en sus ventas, además de la compra de más golosinas.
texts.en:
Beatriz is 39 years old and lives with her husband and their 3 children in her mother-in-law’s home. For the past 12 years, she has sold sweets and food in an educational center located close to her home. She attends to the store every morning with the help of her husband, and in the evenings she rests, planning sales for the next day. By doing so, they are able to obtain income to support the family. For Beatriz and her family, this business brings them a lot of satisfaction, like how it keeps the family together, and how it is a profitable business because sweets and food are always a basic necessity. Moving forward, she wants to implement her business with display cases.

This is Beatriz’s second loan request with MFP. She is one of the most active members of the communal bank and enjoys that at each meeting even if an obstacle arises, she can find reconciliation.

The money that she is requesting will be used to buy display shelves for her cakes that she will place in the window, as well as to buy more sweets.


Translated from Spanish by Sarah Sattin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy display shelves and sweets for her store

loans.name: Bivian

texts.es: Bivian tiene 37 años, vive con su hijo de 7 años en su propia casa. Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de carne de cuyes, tiene de su propio criadero y atiende los pedidos que le soliciten, que generalmente son amistades o vecinos. Además que los fines de semana viaja a otras ciudades para seguir vendiendo, y de esta manera tener más ingresos. Para ello, Bivian cría a sus cuyes con una buena alimentación, hasta el momento está muy  contenta, y desea continuar adelante, mejorando e implementando su granja de cuyes. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, ella fue invitada a formar parte de este banco comunal porque es una de las mujeres emprendedoras de su zona. El dinero que solicita es para la compra de más cuyes de raza y jaulas para ellos.
texts.en:
Bivian is 37 years old and lives with her 7 year old son in her own home. For the last 3 years she has applied herself to the sale of guinea pig meat, she has her own breeding nursery and attends to all of the sales inquiries that are usually from friends or neighbors. In addition to this, she travels on weekends to continue selling and through this makes more money. For all this, Bivian breeds her guinea pigs with good nutrition, and for the moment she is pleased and wants to move forward improving her guinea pig farm.

This is the first time that she has requested a loan with MFP. She was invited to become part of the communal bank because she is one of the enterprising women of her area. The money she requests is for the purchase of more ethnic race guinea pigs and cages.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more ethnic race guinea pigs / Compra de cuyes de raza

loans.name: Eddy

texts.es: Eddy tiene 34 años, es viuda, vive en su casa propia con su hijo y su madre. Comparte su tiempo entre su trabajo como enfermera en un hospital y el cuidado de sus animales, esta última actividad la viene realizando desde su niñez, aprendió lo necesario a lo que respecta a las actividades agrícolas, su madre y su hijo son su brazo derecho para realizar estas  labores mientras está en su trabajo. Pero por las tardes, es ella quien se dedica a cuidar de sus animales, que principalmente son ovejas. Cada día se levanta temprano para no descuidar sus labores, cada mes acude a la feria ganadera de su zona para vender lo que ha criado y nuevamente comprar ovejas pequeñas. Eddy no descansará hasta cumplir con lo que se ha propuesto, que es tener un establo grande donde pueda albergar a mayor cantidad de ovejas, y así tener más capital de venta. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y está muy animada de empezar este trabajo solidario con su grupo, por lo que promete ser una de las socias más activas de su  banco comunal. El dinero que está solicitando es para la compra de más ovejas, caca una está valorizada en 150 soles aproximadamente.
texts.en:
Eddy is 34-year-old widow, who lives with her mother and son in her own house. She splits her time between working in the hospital as a nurse and looking after her animals. She learned all about agriculture as a child and she's been caring for animals ever since. Her mother and son step right in for her while she's at work, but in the afternoons she is the one taking care of the animals, mainly sheep. She gets up early every day so she doesn't neglect her chores. Each month she goes to the livestock fair in her area to sell the sheep she has raised and buy new young ones. Eddy won't rest until she has achieved her goal of having a big stable where she can keep more sheep, which she can sell to raise more capital. This is her first time seeking a loan from MFP and she is very excited about starting to work in solidarity with her group; she promises to be one of the most active members of her village bank. She plans to use her loan to buy more sheep, which cost about 150 soles each.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy young sheep

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith tiene 25 años, vive con sus padres en su casa propia. Se dedica a la atención de su restaurante, ubicado en una carretera muy transitada, este negocio lo administra desde hace varios meses, ella y sus familiares aportaron en el capital de apertura y desde entonces Judith atiende por las tardes, de preferencia todos los días para ofrecer a los clientes el servicio de almuerzos. Hasta el momento el negocio está dando bueno frutos en cuanto a la rentabilidad. Para el futuro, Judith ve con grandes expectativas de éxito y crecimiento su negocio, por lo que se concentrará en mejorar la presentación de su restaurante. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, fue invitada a formar parte de su  banco comunal porque han visto que ella a una persona muy responsable con sus cuentas y colaboradora en todo lo que se dispone. El dinero que está solicitando es para la compra de mercadería en gaseosas, además quiere incursionar en la venta de prendas de vestir que exhibirá en su mismo negocio.
texts.en:
Judith is 25 years old and lives with her parents in their own home. She applies her attention to their restaurant located on a well traveled roadway. They have managed the business for a few months since she and her family members put up the opening capital. Judith prefers to work every afternoon in order to offer the lunch service to the customers. Until now the business has been fruitful regarding profitability. In the future, Judith has great expectations of success and growth for their business as they will concentrate on the improved presentation of their restaurant. This is the first request for a loan from MFP. She was invited to form a part of the communal bank because they have seen that she is a very responsible person with her accounts and works well with others on everything she prepares. They money requested is for the purchase of soft drinks, additionally she wants to include the sale of clothing articles to be displayed at the same business.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of soft drinks for her business / Compra de bebidas para su negocio

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra tiene 39 años, vive con su madre y sus 2 hijos en su propia casa. Desde hace 6 años tiene una tienda donde no solo ofrece productos comestibles, sino también útiles de escritorio, y ha implementado el servicio de llamadas telefónicas, Internet y fotocopias. Este negocio está ubicado en su misma casa, a pocos metros de varias instituciones donde los empleados son sus principales clientes. Sandra recibe el apoyo en la atención de sus hijos y su madre, que son su brazo derecho. Su tienda esta abierta todo el día en la semana, los domingos medio día, que es cuado descansa. Este negocio es un sostén económico familiar y Sandra tiene planes de seguir creciendo con su tienda, hasta que se convierta en un autoservicio con mayor sustentabilidad. Es la segunda vez que  tiene un préstamo con MFP, ella es una de las máximas colaboradoras de su banco comunal y la que alienta a seguir desarrollando un trabajo unido. Con el dinero que solicita comprará abarrotes para implementar su tienda como arroz, azúcar y tarros de leche.
texts.en:
Sandra is 39 years old, and lives with her mother and her two children in their own house. For six years she has had a store where she not only offers food products, but also writing supplies, and has added telephone, Internet, and photocopying services. Her business is located in her home, only a few meters away from various institutions whose employees are her primary customers. Sandra's children, who are her right-hands, help her run her business. Her store is open all day during the week, and for a half day on Sundays, which is the day she rests. This business is the sole source of income for her family and Sandra has plans to continue growing her store until it runs itself and is more self-sustaining.

This will be Sandra's second loan with MFP, and she is one of the best members of her communal bank, and one of the primary forces motivating them to continue developing a united effort. With the money she requests she will buy groceries to stock in her store, such as rice, sugar, and tins of milk.

Translated from Spanish by Shaun Haines, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Stocking up staple goods in her store

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Emilia tiene 30 años, vive con su hijo en casa de sus padres. Se dedica a la elaboración y bordado de fustanes desde hace 3 años, aprendió este oficio por medio de sus vecinas que la apoyaron y ahora ella es independiente de su trabajo. Por lo que obtiene las ganancias al mes de haber trabajado arduamente, para Emilia lo más agradable de su trabajo es que es en su casa donde realiza su labor, esto le permite atender a su hijo de 8 años en sus tareas escolares. Además, nota que dedicarse a esta actividad es rentable porque  pagan bien por cada trabajo que realiza, los fustanes están bien cotizados y cada vez con más permanente los pedidos que ella recibe. Para más adelante quiere ser una micro empresaria y promocionar sus prendas en otros lugares. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, y está muy contenta porque siempre ha gustado de participar en grupos humanos, además porque comparte la solidaridad con sus compañeros. El dinero que está solicitando es para la compra de hilos por conos en diversos colores, además de un caballete, que es un instrumento básico que sirve para estirar la tela mientras se borda.
texts.en:
Emilia is 30 years old and lives with her son in her parents' home. She has been making and embroidering "fustanes" (clothing typical of her region, like a skirt) for three years. She learned this skill from her neighbors who helped her, and now she works independently. For working so arduously every month to earn money, for Emilia the best part of her job is that she can work out of her home, and this allows her to tend to her 8 year old son and his schoolwork. Additionally, she has noticed that doing this work is very profitable, because her customers pay well for each of her creations, and her fustanes are very much sought after and her requests are more and more stable. In the future she would like to be a micro entrepreneur and sell her wares in other places.

This will be Emilia's first loan with MFP, and she is very happy because she has always liked to participate in groups of people, and because she enjoys sharing in solidarity with her friends. The money she requests is for the purchase of spools of thread of various colors, as well as a "caballete", which is a basic tool that she uses to stretch the material while she embroiders it.

Translated from Spanish by Shaun Haines, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of materials to do her embroidery

loans.name: Isela

texts.es: Isela tiene 33 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en casa de su madre. Se dedica a la venta de golosinas y gaseosas desde hace un año, empezó a realizar esta actividad en su casa, la cual está ubicada frente a un parque y atiende todos los días por las mañanas, también se va a vender de forma ambulante en eventos deportivos con una de sus canastas, a veces la ayuda su hijo mayor, pero generalmente va sola. Para Isela este negocio es una distracción que le permite Interactuar con sus clientes, que generalmente son los niños; y las ganancias le permiten solventar los gastos de su hogar. Es la segunda vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, ella es una de las socias de su grupo que apostó por mantener su banco comunal en momentos de conflicto, y ahora se compromete a seguir promoviendo la unidad. El dinero que está solicitando será invertido en la compra de mercadería en golosinas, confites y gaseosas y aprovechar la etapa escolar donde tiene más clientes.
texts.en:
Isela is 33 years old and lives with her husband and two children in her mother's house. She has been selling candy and soft drinks for a year, beginning by working out of her house, which is located in front of a park. She works every day during the morning, and also goes out to sell on foot at sporting events with her products in a basket. Sometimes her oldest son helps her, but usually she does this alone. For Isela this business is a something that allows her to interact with her customers, who are generally children, and the earnings allow her to pay her household costs.

This is the second time she will have a loan with MPF, and she is one of the members of her group that bet on maintaining their communal bank in times of conflict, and now she promises to continue promoting unity. The money she is asking for will be invested in the pruchase of candy, pastries, and soft drinks, so she can take advantage of the school year, when she has the most customers.

Translated from Spanish by Shaun Haines, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of candy, sweets, and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Jessika

texts.es: Jessika tiene 20 años, vive en casa de sus padres. Se dedica a realizar bellos trabajos de bordados de ropa típica desde hace 3 años, realiza estos trabajos en su misma casa, y fue su madre quien le enseñó este arte con el que ahora se solventa ella misma. Jessika borda generalmente por las tardes, ya que en las mañanas se va estudiar, la labor que realiza es muy gratificante porque disfruta de realizar cada bordado, además que le permite tener las ganancias económicas necesarias. Es la primera vez que Jessika está solicitando un préstamo con MFP; y está dispuesta a ser  una de las integrantes más colaboradoras de su banco comunal. El dinero que solicita es para la compra de telas al por mayor e hilos de diversos colores para sus bordados.
texts.en:
Jessika is 20 years old, and lives in her parents' house. She has been doing beautiful embroidery of traditional clothing for three years, which she does in her own home. Her mother was the one who taught her this art with which she now supports herself financially. Jessika usually embroiders in the afternoons, because she goes to school in the mornings. Her work is very satisfying because she enjoys making each embroidery, and it also earns her the money she needs.

This is the first time Jessika has requested a loan from MFP, and she is ready to be one of the most contributing members of her communal bank. She will use the loan money to buy fabrics at wholesale and for various colors of thread which she will use in her embroidery.

Translated from Spanish by Shaun Haines, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de materiales para sus bordados

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy tiene 36 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en la casa de sus padres. Ella y su esposo se dedican al transporte desde hace 11 años, su esposo es el conductor y ella controla los horarios de entrada y salidas de cada ruta que realizan, pues tienen más de un auto con los que brindan el servicio de taxi. Lucy trabaja generalmente por las mañanas y por las tardes atiende a sus hijos pequeños. Hasta el momento está muy contenta porque esta actividad, durante años le ha permitido sostener a su familia y tiene grandes proyectos de continuar delante. Una de sus metas es implementar una tienda de repuestos para autos en el paradero de la línea de taxi que controla. Es la primera vez que está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, y es una de las personas que se compromete a ser participe activa de todas  las actividades que se realicen en su banco comunal y trabajar por el desarrollo del mismo. El dinero que solicita es para pagar el costo del mantenimiento de sus dos autos, para que sigan trabajando, ya que son sus fuentes de ingresos económicos familiares.
texts.en:
Lucy is 36 years old, lives with her husband and three children in her parent’s home. She and her husband have been working in transportation for 11 years. Her husband is a drive and she controls the entry and exit schedule for each route he runs, as they have more than one car in providing taxi service. Lucy generally works in the mornings and in the afternoons she takes care of her small children. Today she is very contest because this work has enabled her to support her family over the years and she has great projects for its future. One of her goals is to open an auto parts store near the taxi line that she controls. This is the first time that she is seeking a loan with MFP, and she is one of the people who have promised to actively participate in all the activities that her communal bank has and work to develop herself as an entrepreneur. The money will be used to pay the cost of maintenance for two of her cars, so that the cars continue working as they are the sources of the family’s income.

Translated from Spanish by Cindy Kendall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Maintenance for two of her cars

loans.name: Madali

texts.es: Madali tiene 22 años, vive con su esposo y su pequeño hijo en casa de sus padres. Desde hace 2 años tiene un restaurante, el cual está ubicado cerca de uno de los paraderos de 2 líneas de transporte, por lo que tiene mayor demanda de sus comidas durante el almuerzo, y es así que llega a cocinas hasta 50 menús por día. Esto es un gran aliciente, porque recibe las ganancias de su ardua y agotadora labor que consiste en ir todas las mañanas a comprar los ingredientes en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad, luego pelar, picar y cocinar, abrir su local y atender sirviendo los almuerzos, que afortunadamente su madre y su padre la ayudan, luego  viene la limpieza, tanto de los cubiertos como del local; de esa manera Madali garantiza el retorno de sus clientes, porque siempre está al pendiente de la higiene y buena sazón de sus comidas. Madali está pensando conseguir una ubicación más comercial para su restaurante como en el centro de la ciudad y ofrecer mayor variedad y cantidad de sus platos. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP, su compromiso es tal, que asume la presidencia dentro de la organización interna de su banco comunal. El dinero que requiere es para adquirir unas vitrinas de exhibición porque va a implementar la venta de bebidas en su restaurante, además comprará cajas de gaseosas.
texts.en:
Madali is 22 years old and lives with her husband and small son in her parents' home. For the past 2 years, she has run a restaurant located close to the bus stop of 2 bus lines; this provides her with greater demand for her food during lunch where she generally serves about 50 people per day. This is a great incentive because she receives the earnings of her arduous, tiring work which consists of going to the city wholesale market every morning to purchase ingredients, then prepare, season, and cook, open the restaurant, and tend to the customers during lunch. Fortunately, her parents help her during the busy lunch hours. Afterwards, she has to do the cleaning. In this way, Madali guarantees that her customers return because she is always aware of the need to serve hygienic, flavorful food. Madali is thinking of getting a more commercial location for her restaurant nearer the city center and hopes to offer a greater variety and quantity of dishes. This is the first loan she has requested from Prisma Microfinance and her commitment is such that she has assumed the presidency of the internal organization of her village bank. The money she will receive will be used to purchase glass shelves so she can begin selling drinks in the restaurant; it will also be used to buy boxes of soft drinks.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of glass shelves and soft drinks

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es: Rosalía tiene 47 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y decidida, vive sola en un cuarto que alquiló cuando llegó desde su natal Capachica (Distrito de Puno). Lleva 4 años endulzando el paladar de sus clientes, su puesto de venta de helados es uno de los más visitados, ya que tiene una gran variedad de sabores para el gusto de todas las personas que concurren a comprar. A ella le gustaría poner una heladería muy grande donde pueda atender bien a sus clientes y brindarles una mejor comodidad, puesto que Rosalía disfruta de vender y conversar con sus clientes. Lo que le resulta difícil es preparar sus helados, ya que le hace demasiado frío. Rosalía trabaja esforzadamente, ya que necesita dinero para mejorar su vida y así poder vivir una buena vejez. Este es su quinto préstamo con MFP, y al igual como hizo con sus anteriores préstamos, desea pagarlo a tiempo y sin dificultades, en su banco comunal es muy respetada, ya que es la socia más activa y comprometida. El dinero que solicita es para comprar ingredientes para fabricar sus ricos helados.
texts.en:
Rosalia is 47 years old and is a very hard-working, decisive woman who lives alone in a room she rented when she arrived from her native city of Capachica in the Puno district. For 4 years, she has worked sweetening the palate of her customers; her ice cream stand is one of the most frequented in the area since she has a large variety of flavors to fit the likes of all who wish to buy. She would like to put up a larger ice cream store where she can better attend to her customers and offer them greater comfort, since Rosalia enjoys selling and conversing with her customers. Her main challenge is preparing the ice cream since it is very cold for her. Rosalia works with great effort since she needs the money to improve her life and live better as she gets older. This is her 5th loan from Prisma Microfinance, and just as she did with her previous loans, she intends to pay it back punctually and with no problems. In her village bank, she is very well respected since she is the most committed and active member. The money will be used to purchase ingredients to make her delicious ice creams.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients to make ice cream

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: A sus 35 años, Roxana ha sabido ganarse la vida por sí sola, tiene una casa propia, la cual está hecha de material noble, se esfuerza mucho para salir adelante y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Cocinando sus ricas salchipapas (platillo hecho a base de salchichas en rodajas y papas fritas) y hamburguesas, Roxana pasa sus días. Disfruta mucho de cocinar y lo hace con mucha habilidad, su comida es comprada por muchos clientes, los cuales acaban con la deliciosa comida en unos segundos. Para el futuro de su negocio espera tener una restaurante, donde pueda vender todo el día y con mayor tranquilidad la comida que prepara, porque actualmente solo lo hace por las noches, aunque tiene 3 años de experiencia en esta actividad, todavía le sigue siendo difícil atender a todos los clientes que tiene, con todo el esfuerzo que realiza espera poder salir adelante y mejorar su vida. Este es su quinto préstamo con MFP y está ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contenta. Con trescientos nuevos soles que solicita planea comprar más ingredientes para preparar sus ricos platillos, con el resto del dinero comprará mesas y sillas para amoblar el restaurante que tanto desea tener.
texts.en:
At 35 years old, Roxana has known how to earn her way through life for herself; she has her own home, which is well-built, and she works hard to move forward and improve her quality of life. She works each day cooking delicious salchipapas (a dish made from sliced hot dogs and french fries) and hamburgers. She enjoys her job and she is a very skilled cook. She has many customers that purchase her food and who often buy seconds. In the future, she hopes to open a restaurant where she can sell the food she prepares all day and with greater ease as she currently only sells at night. Though she has run her business for 3 years, it is still difficult for her to attend to all her customers; yet she hopes to put forth greater effort to move forward and improve her life. This is her 5th loan from Prisma Microfinance and she is saving to pay her installments on time, since she hopes to avoid causing problems for the other members of her village bank where she feels very content. With the money she is requesting, she plans to buy ingredients to prepare her dishes; with the rest of the money she will buy tables and chairs to furnish the restaurant that she wishes to start.

Translated from Spanish by Scott Crandall, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for her dishes

loans.name: Valentina

texts.es: Valentina tiene 42 años, es soltera y desde muy joven se esforzó por mejorar su vida, vive en su casa propia y trabaja sin descanso para alcanzar las metas que se ha trazado. Lleva 2 años trabajando sin descanso en su acogedora casa, tejiendo chalinas, faldas, fajas, etc, las cuales lleva a vender a la feria dominical de Juliaca, donde sus clientes las compran rápidamente. Valentina se divierte mucho tejiendo sus artesanías, lo cual la llena de satisfacción ya que siente que más que en trabajo, es una distracción. Espera que con el tiempo pueda tener una tienda donde pueda vender con más comodidad, lo que menos le gusta de su negocio, es bordar los pequeños detalles, ya que le toman demasiado tiempo. Valentina sabe que tiene que trabajar mucho para alcanzar sus metas y está dispuesta a hacerlo con tal de lograrlo. Son cuatro ya los préstamos que Valentina ha solicitado en MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y nunca ha tenido problemas con su banco comunal, donde es la encargada de poner la cuota de responsabilidad. Para incrementar su capital de trabajo invertirá el dinero que solicita en comprar más lana, para aumentar la cantidad de artesanías que teje.
texts.en:
Valentina is 42 years old, single and since she was young makes an effort to improve her life. She lives in her own house and works without rest in order to reach the goals that she has planned. She has been working 2 years without rest in her cozy home, sewing scarves, skirts, sashes, etc. She takes these to sell at the Sunday fair of Juliaca where her customers buy them quickly. Valentina has a lot of fun sewing her artisan items, which she finds satisfying and makes her feel it is more of a hobby than just a job. She hopes that with time she can have a store where she can sell more conveniently. What she likes least about her business is the embroidery of tiny details as it takes too much time. Valentina knows that she has to work a lot to reach her goals but she is willing to do it so that she will accomplish them. We have already made four loans to Valentina that she has requested from MFP. She has been punctual in her payments and has never had problems with the communal bank where she is in charge of her share of responsibility. In order to increase her working capital, she will invest the requested money in purchasing wool to increase the amount of artesian items she sews.

Translated from Spanish by Andrea Kellogg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy wool for her sewing  / Compra de lana para sus tejidos

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es: Iván es un joven de 26 años, vive en la casa de sus padres, a los cuales quiere mucho y desea ayudar con los gastos del hogar. Siempre ha deseado trabajar para ayudar a sus padres, desde hace 7 años se dedica al negocio del servicio de internet inalámbrico, en su barrio Cerro Colorado de la ciudad de Juliaca, donde tiene muchos clientes. Iván disfruta de trabajar con la internet, sabe que con este negocio puede ayudar a la economía de su hogar, por ello desea comprar más materiales para armar sus antenas caseras, de esta manera podrá mejorar sus ingresos económicos. Lo difícil de su trabajo es cargar los pesados tubos metálicos que usa como antenas, pero sabe que tiene que trabajar muy duro para alcanzar sus metas y está dispuesto a sacrificar su juventud con tal de lograrlo. Este es el primer préstamo de Iván con MFP, y no quiere dejar de pagarlo por falta de dinero, así que está dispuesto a ahorrar día a día para poder pagarlo, él es el único varón de su banco comunal por lo que siempre trata de ser responsable y respetuoso con las demás socias. Con el dinero solicitado comprará más materiales para fabricar una mayor cantidad de antenas de internet inalámbrico y así mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Iván is a young man 26 years old who lives with his parents for whom he wants the best and he wants to help with the household expenses. He has always wanted to work to help his parents and for the last seven years he has dedicated himself to a wireless internet service business in his neighborhood of Cerro Colorado in the city of Juliaca where he has many customers. Iván enjoys working with the internet and knows that with this business he is able to help with household expenses. Therefore, he wants to buy more materials to outfit his handmade antennas and in this way he can improve his income. The difficult part of his work is to carry the heavy metal tubes that he uses as antennas, but he knows that he must work very hard to reach his goals and he is prepared to sacrifice his youth in order to achieve them.

This is Iván’s first loan with MFP and he does not want to fail to pay for lack of money, so he is prepared to save day by day in order to pay it. He is the only man of his communal bank so he is always careful to be responsible and respectful of the female partners. With the money he is asking for he will buy more materials to build a large quantity of wireless internet antennas and thereby improve his income.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Materials for the fabrication of antennas

loans.name: Juvenal

texts.es: Juvenal es un joven de 26 años, vive solo en una casa alquilada, donde tiene su negocio y lo que más desea es salir adelante. Dándole gusto al paladar de sus clientes, Juvenal pasa sus días, vestido con su mandilito blanco realiza sus actividades diarias, pues tiene un snack en el centro de la ciudad de Juliaca, donde vende sus deliciosas pizzas, a él le gusta bromear y conversar con sus clientes y desea que su negocio crezca y se vuelva una gran pizzería, para así mejorar sus ingresos económicos, lo más difícil de su trabajo es tener que mantener su horno de pizzas caliente. Son 4 años los que lleva en este negocio y siente que ya es hora de progresar, Juvenal está muy contento con su negocio, ya que desde que lo puso su vida ha mejorado mucho. Es el primer préstamo que tiene con MFP, y se siente en la capacidad de pagar todas sus cuotas, es uno de los miembros más activos en su banco comunal, por eso es muy querido y respetado. Con el dinero solicitado pretende comprar más ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus pizzas, ya que quiere que su negocio progrese.
texts.en:
Twenty-six year old Juvenal lives alone in a rented house where he has his business. What he most wants is to get ahead. Juvenal spends his days pleasing his customers’ palates. He goes about his daily activities dressed in his white apron. He has a snack bar in the center of Juliaca (city) where he sells his delicious pizzas. He likes to joke and talk with his customers. He wants his business to grow and become a great pizzeria. This way he could improve his income. The most difficult thing about his work is that he has to keep the pizza oven hot. He has been in this business 4 years. He feels it is now time to progress. Juvenal is very happy with his business. Since he started it his life has much improved. This is his first loan with MFP, and he feels capable of making all of his payments. Because he is one of the most active members of his community bank he is well liked and respected. With the loan he will buy the ingredients necessary for making his pizzas. He wants his business to progress.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy ingredients

loans.name: Katerin

texts.es: Katerin es una joven alegre y muy querida por sus vecinos, a sus 20 años vive sola en la casa que le heredaron sus padres y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. Tiene una pequeña librería en el centro de la ciudad de Juliaca, vende cuadernos, lapiceros, plumones, y todo tipo de útiles de escritorio. Ahora se encuentra vendiendo lo último en útiles escolares, ya que quiere aprovechar el inicio de clases en los distintos centros educativos de la ciudad. Para Katerin lo más difícil de su trabajo, es saber qué producto se venderá más para comprar de ese, pero aun así disfruta mucho de ofrecer a sus clientes las cosas que tiene en su librería. Tiene ya 4 años en esta actividad y anhela ver crecer su librería y que se vuelva la principal de su barrio, ya que así podrá mejorar sus ingresos económicos y cambiar su vida para bien. Es el tercer préstamo de Katerin con MFP, ha pagado puntualmente sus anteriores créditos y este último espera pagarlo a tiempo también, en su banco comunal es muy participativa. Con los dos mil nuevos soles que solicita planea implementar mejor su librería, para así tener más productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Katerin is a cheerful girl, very well liked by all those who know her. She is 20 years old and lives alone in a house that she inherited from her parents. She is a very active participant in her Communal Bank and has a great desire to succeed in life. She owns a small stationers in the center of Juliaca city, selling notebooks, pens, markers, and all kinds of stationary. Currently, she is taking advantage of the fact that the beginning of the school year is approaching for most of the city's schools, and selling all the best kinds of school supplies. For Katerin, the hardest part about her work is always having to know what products will be the most popular so that she can stock them in her store; but she does not truly mind because she really enjoys pleasing her clients. She has been running the store for 4 years now and dreams of seeing it grow until it becomes the best in the neighbourhood - it would increase her income and change her life for the better. This is Katerin's third loan from MFP. She has always been punctual with her payments and expects to be just as punctual this time. With the 2,000 soles that she will receive, she plans to improve her store's set up, so that she can increase the range of goods that she can offer her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy supplies

loans.name: Martin

texts.es:
El señor Martín H. Ríos ha sido un buen cliente el ya había tenido un crédito lo cual pago muy bien ese crédito, se utilizó para una diferencia para adquirir  vivienda de interés social. Ahora su crédito es para la casa que le otorgaron desea ponerle una barda al frente de su casa para tener mas seguridad. Para realizar su proyecto el necesita comprar material y mano de obra.
El es la única persona que sostiene la casa pero trabaja horas extras para mantener la familia.
texts.en:
Martin H. R. has been a good client: he received a loan and repaid it. He used that loan to pay the difference on a house from social services.

Today, he is asking or a loan to build a wall in the front of the house he was given, in order to make it safer. To realize his project, he needs to buy building material and pay for manual labour. He is the sole financial support of the household and works extra hours to support his family.

Translated from Spanish by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy building material for a wall

loans.name: Selene

texts.es:
Selene R. y su esposo que poco apoco han ido construyéndole con ahorros pensando en el patrimonio de su hija. La casa es de interese social lo cual la ha ido haciendo cambios como pintura y mas habitaciones, pero ahora ella se esta preocupando por la seguridad de su familia ya que en la parte de enfrente le falta el portón. 
Selene mas que todo se preocupa por el bienestar de la familia ya que en el trabajo donde esta a veces tiene que salir de la ciudad y teme que le pase a su hija.
texts.en:
Selene R. and her husband have been building their house little by little with their savings, investing in it as their daughter's inheritance.

The house is from social services and they've been renovating it by painting and building more rooms. However, Selene is worried about the safety of her family because the front of the house is missing the gate door. More than anything, Selene is concerned with the well-being of her family as she sometimes has to travel for work and fears something will happen to her daughter.

Translated from Spanish by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy tools and building material

loans.name: Cornelio

texts.es: El Señor Cornelio Gordón trabaja como operador de una Maquiladora. El Tiene 2 Hijos y su esposa, solicita un crédito para levantar las bardas en la parte de atrás de su casa ya que el Trabaja de 4:00 de la tarde  a 2:00 de la mañana y se preocupa mucho por la seguridad de su familia es por ello que quiere levantar la barda en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Señor Cornelio Gordón works as a machinist in a large factory. He and his wife have 2 children. He is asking for a loan so that he can build higher walls in the rear of his of property. Working nights, from 4pm to 2am, he worries about his family's safety and would like to raise the wall so that his home is more secure.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a wall
